SEARCH
Package view

Class PhotosController

java.lang.Object
view.PhotosController
public class PhotosController extends Object
This class acts as listener for all events fired from the Photo/album buttons. It keeps track of the current state instance of the Photos model. When an event is handled by the controller, it delegates event processing to the current state instance, which processes the event and returns the next state.

When the Photos starts up, it is set to the login state.

Modified design of CalculatorController develeoped by Sesh Venogupal
